page.title: 02General Information One
page.content:
To the western side of our area is the village of North Baddesley. This area is mostly farmland growing grass for silage and some spring barley. There are four farms in this area: Manor Farm, Zion's Hill Farm, Knightswood Farm and Ryder's Farm.
There is also an area of woodland mostly of coniferous trees. In this woodland is a small game park.
On the eastern side of the area is Chandler's Ford. This area is mainly formed of residential and industrial estates.
There is a railway through this area which connects Eastleigh with Romsey.
